chapterDescription: Integrated mock interview drills combining scoping, tradeoff reasoning, capacity math, failure analysis, and design iteration.

Alternatives are weaker because they defer mitigation, rely on brittle assumptions, or increase operational risk.

A strong answer also names one residual risk and one post-rollout verification signal.
